text:
An Election Control room has been set up the Collector’s Office in the district. Complaints regarding the election can be lodged with the officials by dialling 04329-228300/228400/228500/228600/8903710362 or the toll-free number 18004257032, Collector A. Saravanavelraj said in a press release.

Rs. 16 lakh seized

in Pudukottai

Election officials have seized about Rs. 16 lakh in cash transported in a vehicle in the district on Wednesday. According to sources, a Flying Squad intercepted the vehicle at Perumanadu near Viralimalai and the found the cash being transported without valid documents. The cash was reportedly being taken to fill ATMs. However, the cash was handed over to the Returning Officer.
title: Control room in Ariyalur
